sentences.sContent: Unsure whether I have been understood, I put in a brisk spurt to the nunnery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unsure whether I have been understood, I put in a brisk spurt to the nunnery.
sentences.sCn: 不知道他是否明白我的意思，我快步冲刺般地朝尼姑庵跑去。

sentences.sContent: I like to think they were sent to a nunnery, but in any case they disappeared.
sentences.sContent_eng: I like to think they were sent to a nunnery, but in any case they disappeared.
sentences.sCn: 我认为她们可能被送到女修道院去了，但是不管怎么样她们还是消失了。
